portfolio.title: ML March Madness
portfolio.description: A machine learning attempt to predict results of march madness matchups, based on years of regular season and tourney data.

portfolio.title: Global City Data
portfolio.description: Used by the U of Minnesota to host descriptions of open access urban data sets collected by a network of international researchers.

portfolio.title: Planet Wars Strategy
portfolio.description: Given a planet wars game engine, my friend and I created a strategy in Java to take over the solar system. Mwuahahaha! School project.

portfolio.title: Data Structures Cheat Sheet
portfolio.description: Java implementations of popular data structures, complete with time + space analysis.

portfolio.title: Anu Ramaswami's Website
portfolio.description: A Django powered website for Anu Ramaswami, Chair of Science, Technology, and Public Policy at the Humphrey School of Public Affairs.

portfolio.title: This Website
portfolio.description: I built this very website! It is completely static and hosted by the good grace of Github Pages.

portfolio.title: Blackjack
portfolio.description: Play blackjack with as many players as you'd like against a computer dealer in this interactive Python script. Money updated in real time.

portfolio.title: Forest Fire Simulation
portfolio.description: A Python script visualizing a forest fire in turtle graphics, dynamically based on forest characteristic inputs. School project.

portfolio.title: Hangman
portfolio.description: An interactive Python script where you can play hangman against the computer, visualized in turtle graphics. School project.
